name: claude-conductor
description: Transform ephemeral AI sessions into structured, context-driven development with persistent Markdown artifacts
author: Mick Davidson

commands.name: conductor:setup
commands.description: Initialize Conductor for this project with interactive setup

commands.description: Create a new feature track with spec and execution plan

commands.name: conductor:status

skills.name: conductor-context
